mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Y.*, ROWNUM as RNUM FROM ( SELECT X.* FROM ( SELECT ADD_NO ,ADD_NAME ,ADD_CTG_NO ,(SELECT ADD_CTG_NAME FROM ADD_CATEGORY C WHERE A.ADD_CTG_NO = C.ADD_CTG_NO AND ADD_CTG_NO=#{addCtgNo}) AS ADD_CTG_NAME ,ADD_LOCATION_INFO ,ADD_PRICE ,ADD_REGDATE ,APT_NO ,ADDINFO_IMG_FILENAME ,ADDINFO_IMG_ORIGINAL_FILENAME ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ADD_ORDER_LIST O WHERE A.ADD_NO = O.ADD_NO) AS ORDER_CNT FROM ADDITIONAL_FACILITY_INFO A WHERE APT_NO = (SELECT APT_NO FROM HOUSEHOLD_INFO WHERE HOUSEHOLD_CODE = #{householdCode}) AND ADD_OUTDATE IS NULL ) X
WHERE ${searchCondition} like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY ADD_REGDATE DESC )Y )
WHERE RNUM > #{firstRecordIndex} AND RNUM <= #{firstRecordIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT A.ADD_CTG_NO ,(SELECT ADD_CTG_NAME FROM ADD_CATEGORY C WHERE C.ADD_CTG_NO = A.ADD_CTG_NO) AS ADD_CTG_NAME ,A.ADD_NO ,A.ADD_NAME ,A.ADD_LOCATION_INFO ,A.ADD_CONTENT ,A.ADD_PRICE ,A.APT_NO ,A.ADD_REGDATE ,A.ADDINFO_IMG_FILENAME ,A.ADDINFO_IMG_ORIGINAL_FILENAME ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ADD_ORDER_LIST O WHERE A.ADD_NO = O.ADD_NO) AS ORDER_CNT FROM ADDITIONAL_FACILITY_INFO A WHERE A.ADD_NO= #{addNo} AND A.ADD_OUTDATE IS NULL
SELECT MEMBER_NO ,HOUSEHOLD_CODE ,MEMBER_IMG_FILENAME ,MEMBER_IMG_ORIGINAL_FILENAME ,ID ,MEMBER_NAME ,EMAIL ,OUTDATE FROM MEMBER_INFO WHERE HOUSEHOLD_CODE=#{householdCode}

SELECT A.ADD_ORDER_LIST_NO ,A.ADD_NO ,(SELECT ADD_NAME FROM ADDITIONAL_FACILITY_INFO F WHERE F.ADD_NO=A.ADD_NO ) AS ADD_NAME ,A.HOUSEHOLD_CODE ,(SELECT ADD_PRICE FROM ADDITIONAL_FACILITY_INFO F WHERE F.ADD_NO=A.ADD_NO ) AS ADD_PRICE ,A.ADD_ORDERDATE ,A.ADD_OUTDATE ,A.MEMBER_NO ,M.MEMBER_NAME ,M.EMAIL ,M.ID FROM ADD_ORDER_LIST A JOIN MEMBER_INFO M ON A.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE A.HOUSEHOLD_CODE=#{householdCode} ORDER BY A.ADD_ORDER_LIST_NO DESC

SELECT A.ADD_ORDER_LIST_NO ,A.ADD_NO ,(SELECT ADD_NAME FROM ADDITIONAL_FACILITY_INFO F WHERE F.ADD_NO=A.ADD_NO ) AS ADD_NAME ,A.HOUSEHOLD_CODE ,(SELECT ADD_PRICE FROM ADDITIONAL_FACILITY_INFO F WHERE F.ADD_NO=A.ADD_NO ) AS ADD_PRICE ,A.ADD_ORDERDATE ,A.ADD_OUTDATE ,A.MEMBER_NO ,M.MEMBER_NAME ,M.EMAIL ,M.ID FROM ADD_ORDER_LIST A JOIN MEMBER_INFO M ON A.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE A.MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo} ORDER BY A.ADD_ORDER_LIST_NO DESC
SELECT TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,1),ADD_ORDERDATE)) AS ADD_CHARGE_CNT FROM ADD_ORDER_LIST WHERE ADD_ORDER_LIST_NO = #{addOrderListNo}

SELECT A.ADD_ORDER_LIST_NO ,A.ADD_NO ,(SELECT ADD_NAME FROM ADDITIONAL_FACILITY_INFO F WHERE F.ADD_NO=A.ADD_NO ) AS ADD_NAME ,(SELECT ADD_PRICE FROM ADDITIONAL_FACILITY_INFO F WHERE F.ADD_NO=A.ADD_NO ) AS ADD_PRICE ,(SELECT TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,0),ADD_ORDERDATE)) FROM ADD_ORDER_LIST O WHERE O.ADD_ORDER_LIST_NO = A.ADD_ORDER_LIST_NO ) AS ADD_CHARGE_CNT ,A.HOUSEHOLD_CODE ,A.ADD_ORDERDATE ,A.ADD_OUTDATE ,A.MEMBER_NO ,M.MEMBER_NAME ,M.EMAIL ,M.ID FROM ADD_ORDER_LIST A JOIN MEMBER_INFO M ON A.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE A.HOUSEHOLD_CODE=#{householdCode} ORDER BY A.ADD_ORDER_LIST_NO DESC
